message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let's see if we can work something out.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product brings to you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $10,800 is still slightly out of my budget.  How about we split the difference and go with $10,650?  This would be a good deal for both of us.
I understand your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any higher than $10,800. I'm willing to make a small concession, though. I'll meet you at $10,700. This is the best I can do.
